strongs_def: regal (in relation), i.e. (literally) belonging to (or befitting) the sovereign (as land, dress, or a courtier), or (figuratively) preeminent
outline:
1. of or belong to a king, kingly, royal, regal
    1. of a man, the officer or minister of a prince, a courtier
  2. subject to a king
    1. of a country
  3. befitting or worthy of a king, royal
  4. metaph. principal, chief
